.. _deployment:

Deployment
==========

..
    SPDX-License-Identifier: CC-BY-SA-4.0
    Copyright Tumult Labs 2025

Tumult Analytics is a Python library. It can be installed either
:ref:`locally <installation>`, on a server (including in tightly controlled or
air-gapped environments), or on a cloud platform.

The following guides provide more details on how to deploy and run the Tumult
Platform in various environments. Additional pages focus on
:ref:`Spark configuration and performance <spark>`, as well as
:ref:`Troubleshooting <troubleshooting>`.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1

   aws-glue
   databricks
   spark
   troubleshooting
